title: For those who think that Kog'Maw isn't cute (with proof that Riot thinks he is)
body:
just playing a normal game, with Kog'Maw (ap mid obviously) When I suddenly read the chat and....
http://i.imgur.com/XyOX0bS.png

replies.body: Maybe he was hit by Lulu's W and that changes his name - similar to if Anivia types while in egg - she is displayed as Eggnivia. Something like that happens with Gnar and Mega Gnar, and I think on pre-rework Quinn when she was replaced by Valor

> [{quoted}](name=Awesomeasf ck,realm=EUW,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=QAi3772J,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-07T21:27:28.771+0000)
>
> Maybe he was hit by Lulu's W and that changes his name - similar to if Anivia types while in egg - she is displayed as Eggnivia. Something like that happens with Gnar and Mega Gnar, and I think on pre-rework Quinn when she was replaced by Valor

Yup! This is a result of Polymorph. Each Lulu skin has a different Polymorph critter, resulting in a different name. By the looks of the name, this was from Wicked Lulu! :D 

For reference: 

Base - Squill
Bittersweet - Cupcake 
Wicked - Kitty 
Dragon Trainer - Dragon
Winter Wonder - Snowman
Pool Party - Seal

^-^

Yay, an answer from a RITO-er

https://i.kinja-img.com/gawker-media/image/upload/wzxnt9kt69lz4k28ubsq.jpg

edit: I knew that different skin have different critters, but I never knew that Polymorph changes the name. Cool thing though
so THATS why at vandiril's video it said (Dragon)
